Summary: tiny bright lights in the sky moving west to east
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a smoke break and noticed some weird lights floating near the crescent moon. i watched them (4 of them) move east towards the sun. by the time they were near the sun, there were about 40 lights or so. they were circling, darting, and jogging, but most stayed on an easterly course. after about 20 minutes they were all gone from my view. 12:00 - 12:20pm EST
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There was one other sighting in Columbus on or around September 27th 2005
